ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 152
ygData.msgSnippet: Lungs are not trivial at skill 106. i am impressed someone here made ONLY 10 Lungs and raised skill 3 times.  that is quite impressive. with an int of 195, and
ygData.messageBody:
Lungs are not trivial at skill 106. i am impressed someone here made ONLY 10
Lungs and raised skill 3 times. that is quite impressive. with an int of
195, and after successfully crafting 17 Lungs, and probably failing maybe 15
times...i have only raised skill 4 times.
my thoughts on dismond dust: the key lies in Rathe Mtns...
Possibilities:
1.) Take diamond to Ogre "gem crusher guy" and he crushes
diamond-get dust back.
2.) Take diamond to Gnome gem cutter guy, have him cut the
diamond...and get dust back.
now all i need is a diamond and i'll give choice #2 a try.
-Ranth
